Plot: In New York City, a husband and wife butt heads with the granddaughters of the elderly woman who lives in the apartment the couple owns.
Title: Please Give
Actors: Rebecca Hall, Elizabeth Keener, Elise Ivy, Catherine Keener
tomatoConsensus: Nicole Holofcener's newest might seem slight in places, but its rendering of complex characters in a conflicted economic landscape is varied, natural, and touching all the same.
